```{r}
library(cmna)
```

```{r}
func <- function(x) {
  x^3 + 4 * x^2 - 10
}

curve(func, xlim=c(0,3), col='blue', lwd=1, lty=2)
abline(h=0)
abline(v=0)
```
#### Metode Bisection

```{r}
bisection(func, 1, 2)
```

#### Metode Newton

```{r}
library(Deriv)
```

```{r}
fp <- Deriv(func)
fp
```
```{r}
newton(func, fp, 1.5)
```
